rules_text:
Scry 7, then you may reveal the top card of your library. If the revealed card is a nonland permanent card, exile it and as long as it remains in exile, you may cast it and it costs {1} less to cast for each creature you control with flying.
Flashback {6}{U}{U}{B} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]
